brainly_data.question: Which example shows BEST how colonial America was a market economy? A)	Colonists refused to pay taxes to the British crown. B)	Colonists could keep the profits from their businesses. C)	The British Navy protected colonists from foreign attacks. D)	The British crown limited colonial trade with foreign countries.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Which example shows BEST how colonial America was a market economy? A)	Colonists refused to pay taxes to the British crown. B)	Colonists could keep the profits from their businesses. C)	The British Navy protected colonists from foreign attacks. D)	The British crown limited colonial trade with foreign countries.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: A)	Colonists refused to pay taxes to the British crown.

all_answers.question: Which example shows BEST how colonial America was a market economy? A)	Colonists refused to pay taxes to the British crown. B)	Colonists could keep the profits from their businesses. C)	The British Navy protected colonists from foreign attacks. D)	The British crown limited colonial trade with foreign countries.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The answer is B). colonists could keep the profits from their businesses

top_answer.question: Which example shows BEST how colonial America was a market economy? A)	Colonists refused to pay taxes to the British crown. B)	Colonists could keep the profits from their businesses. C)	The British Navy protected colonists from foreign attacks. D)	The British crown limited colonial trade with foreign countries.
top_answer.subject: History
